comments:
If you import and there isn't enough disk space the error message that is 
generated does not make any sense. It is something like "could not write meta 
data ....". This does not help the user understand what to do next.

Also, there are somewhat more usefull stack traces that are not surfaced. I 
noticed the following was logged to the console, notice that these stact traces
actually know about the no more disk space.

Changed IndexedStore to nest all IOExceptions and include them in stack traces.
Fixed missing messages in IndexedStore.

See related bugs 19680, 19667.
